sense.name: improvement
sense.commentary: gradual improvement or growth or development
sense.examples: The progress of medical science has been quick. There is also great progress in the arts.

sense.name: physically moving
sense.commentary: PROGRESS[+event] progression, procession, advance, forward motion, onward motion - the act of moving forward toward a goal
sense.examples: He listened for the progress of the troops.

sense.name: metaphoric advancement
sense.commentary: PROGRESS[+event] progression, procession, advance, forward motion, onward motion - the act of moving forward toward a goal
sense.examples: His emotional progress was quick. Progress on the project began in December.
